capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's family history and it turns out he has a pretty complex lineage. He's actually a mix of both pure-blood wizarding families, which is quite interesting. I'm fairly certain that this information is accurate, and I'd say it's a fact worth noting. Overall, I think it's a fascinating aspect of his character, and it adds depth to the story.
